LanguageData.Ammo_RPG7Grenade_HEAT.label: РПГ-7 граната (HEAT)
LanguageData.Ammo_RPG7Grenade_HEAT.description: Rocket-propelled grenade designed for the RPG-7 launcher. After being fired a rocket motor kicks in to propel the grenade further.
LanguageData.Ammo_RPG7Grenade_Thermobaric.label: РПГ-7 граната (Thermobaric)
LanguageData.Ammo_RPG7Grenade_Thermobaric.description: Rocket-propelled grenade designed for the RPG-7 launcher. After being fired a rocket motor kicks in to propel the grenade further.
LanguageData.Ammo_RPG7Grenade_Frag.label: РПГ-7 граната (Frag)
LanguageData.Ammo_RPG7Grenade_Frag.description: Rocket-propelled grenade designed for the RPG-7 launcher. After being fired a rocket motor kicks in to propel the grenade further.
